about_the_game:
Soundtrack for visual novel Ceiba is a fusion of ambient and synthwave with elements of traditional electronics and Berlin school by the electronic duo Synthelligence. The playlist consists of both exclusive tracks and works from albums "Memory Cell" and "The Shift".

Composers: Yuriy Miller, Roman Rogov
Mixing & mastering: Alexander Zharikov (Moskva-Kassiopeya), Alexey Titov (HARDFUN Music)
detailed_description:
Soundtrack for visual novel Ceiba is a fusion of ambient and synthwave with elements of traditional electronics and Berlin school by the electronic duo Synthelligence. The playlist consists of both exclusive tracks and works from albums "Memory Cell" and "The Shift".
